Package rmp

Interface Summary
JxtaReliableEventListener Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
This interface is used in order to set up a JxtaReliableMcastChannel listener.
 

Class Summary
ChannelProvider Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
ChannelProvider is a simple class that holds information about the provider of a channel.
JxtaReliableEvent Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
Container of the JxtaReliableEvent events, generated by the sending - receiving action of the channel Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005 Company: JXTA ORG
JxtaReliableMcastChannel Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description: :
The connections between the nodes of the multicast tree of the channel that are used for exchanging messages, are implemented with JxtaBiDiPipes in both directions.
JxtaReliableMcastService Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
This class is the manager of the channels that a node-peer can create or can join to.
ReliableMessageFactory Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
This class has the puprose to provide some ease
-- on the construction of a message,
-- on extracting some message elements and
-- it also provides the constants of the RMS [all messages are RMS specific].
TestRMS  
 

Exception Summary
RMSException Title: Reliable Multicast Pipes Description:
The class RMSException is a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.
